name: Death Hazard
description:
In this game, you must survive the most waves of zombies. It is simple, you can only move and shoot. But, at each round, it is gonna be harder. Good luck, Survivor ...

It is a little game that I made for a school project, so it isn't the best game ever. But, I would like to have your thought about it.

If you send a picture of your score in the comments, I will put it in the leaderboard ! Rank
Name of the player
Number of waves survived
